https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/od3ZsMNLJvfqqQUCqmbawnmRdno.jpg Shows the devastation caused by the atomic bomb, and by use of a fictional storyline, portrays the struggle of the ordinary Japanese people in dealing with the aftermath. Children of Hiroshima
